p.d: In the town of Tulle, the artist Manuel Marquis is found murdered. Captain Léna Ribeiro leads the investigation but discovers she has to work with Axel Zeller, head of the Bordeaux criminal police research section, the former love of her life whom she hasn't seen for thirteen years. Directed by: Adeline Darraux (France, 2019) Screenplay: Marc-Antoine-Laurent, Jean-Marc Taba Cast: Arié Elmaleh (Axel Zeller), Carole Bianic (Léna Ribeiro), Olivier Benard (Warrant Officer Charon), Jennifer Maria (Anne Carnot), Joyce Jonathan (Karine Dardelet), Robin Gros (Samuel Marquis), Guillaume Delalandre (Clovis Gensac), Frédéric Kneip (Gilles Carnot),? Jean-Claude Drouot (Victor Ribeiro), Alain Stern (Colonel Lombard), Denis Boyer (Richard Escot), Thierry Charriere (Lionel Fabre), Gabriel Allées (Julien Delorme) Genre: detective
